subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The trade that stunned the N.F.L. was a clear recognition that Hue Jackson, in his first year as a head coach on any level, had suddenly become one of the most powerful coaches in the game.
snippet: The trade that stunned the N.F.L. was a clear recognition that Hue Jackson, in his first year as a head coach on any level, had suddenly become one of the most powerful coaches in the game.
